sourcesContent: import 'swiper/css' import { Box, Button, Card, CardContent, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react' import useProduct from '@/hooks/shopping/useProduct' const ProductDetailPage = () => { const { id } = useParams() const { data: product, isLoading } = useProduct(Number(id)) if (isLoading || !product) return Loading... return ( {/* 제목 */} {product.name} {/* 이미지 슬라이드 */} {product.images.length > 0 ? ( product.images.map((image, index) => ( )) ) : ( No Image Available )} {/* 제품 정보 */} ${product.price.toFixed(2)} {product.description} {product.summary} {/* 상점 정보 */} Store Details Store Name: {product.shop.name} Owner: {product.shop.owner.nickname} ({product.shop.owner.handle}) Contact: {product.shop.owner.phoneNumber} {/* 장바구니 버튼 */} {product.detailImages.map((image) => ())} ) } export default ProductDetailPage
